resources.string: WARNING : If you are using the app while driving, please focus on your driving.\n\nThe displayed values are retrieved using the GPS and Cellular signals. The values shown may not be accurate. The users should not always rely on these values as it may display inaccurate results due to certain reasons such as low signal strengths.

To change the units of speed or distance tap on the speed/distance to choose the unit. To give a tilt to the map, use two finger gestures parallel in vertical direction (same as in google maps). Similarly, you can rotate, zoom-in, zoom-out the map.
